body: 最後應該是被拋棄了，主要是女主回家，並且家人都發現她現在這個樣子，並且報警，幹她的人可能都被逮捕了，作者後面畫出如果回到正常生活的女主的圖，應該是女主最後回到正常生活且繼續接受治療的彩蛋
Thats what you get for being stupid and letting someone to fuck you the same day you met him, lol. Feel bad for her parents and akkun but its not real so idrc
See? This is why you don't get involved with the Cash Company. Can't trust those assholes.
Man all of this is her fault, some hoes really ruin their lives just to get some dick, honestly akkun is lucky asf, he doesn't have to get involved in that hoe and can get a genuinely good lover.
Damn, what a ride. I almost feel sorry for the character. A good work this is, not bad author.

"Girl does need some help and a stable support system now" Lol. She won't need it. You know why? Because this is fiction. Lololol. You guys are taking this too seriously. It not real.  Comments like this that offer advice to fictional characters always make me laugh.
poor akkun.. if it was me i'll give a lesson to that blonde dumbass till he regret why he's alive in this world,,

"Down the drain..." How appropriately titled... Stupid bitch. Well, I hope Akkun at least kicks the shit out of the other guys for mistreating her. Girl does need some help and a stable support system now. Better if he just gave up on her, though, when it comes to romance.
This is too much of damage... Like a liar looking for forgiveness from the start...
If this you see that you shouldn't change yourself because someone else
